Key:
I-If I have to choose one person... I guess it'd
be Origami.
I had faith that you'd say that, Shido.

What?! Are you insane, Shido? Why won't you
say you'll go with me?!

Jealousy. Although Master Origami is indeed a
wonderful woman, why wouldn't you choose
Kaguya or Yuzuru?

W-Well, hold on. It's not like that. Well, you
see... Uh, right. I wanted to talk to Origami
about something...

What, no fairrrrr... If you want to talk, just
get it over with and go on a date with me,
darling!

Shido! Of all people, Origami Tobiichi?! You'd
have so much more fun going on a date with me!
Ngh... It's no use. This is getting out of hand.

(I know! At a time like this... I'm going to have
to call the Fraxinus for help...)

(Whenever I run into issues, they always give me
some pointers or instructions. They should be
able to save me from this situation...!)
Oh, you seem to be in trouble, Shido.
Perfect timing, Kotori.

(My little sister Kotori is the Commander of the
Fraxinus. She should be a dependable advisor at
a time like this... I think.)
Can you solve this problem for me?
Hmm. The girls in front of you, aside from\nOrigami, may possibly go berserk if you\nhurt them carelessly. You know that, right?
I know that. That's why I'm struggling.
And you're going to choose Origami, knowing\nthat?

Yeah. Of all the girls here, Origami is the only
one who's not a Spirit. I feel like if I choose
her, it'll be the most fair...
I see. Well, surprisingly, it looks like you've\nthought it through for once. Then you do that.\nI'll handle the others.
Got it, thanks.
All right, Origami...
Roger.
What?!
Let's go now... Come, Shido.
Where did you get that?!
Come.
Ahhh... Hey...?!
(Origami pulled my hand and led me to...)
Our classroom...
I don't think anyone will find us here.

Th-That's true. I guess no one would think we'd
come back to our starting point...

And if were to do something naughty, no one
would catch us here.
W-We won't be... doing anything like that.
Then, something dirty...
That means the same thing!
Something indecent...
This is a school! It's not that kind of place!

So, it's something we can do if we change
locations?
Th-That's not what I meant, either!
That's unfortunate...

I see... So, now that we're back here, what
should we do?
Homework. We might as well finish.

Like I said, I won't—
Wait, what? Homework?
Exactly. It's just as you said.

Sure, but... Well, I guess I have you here, so
I'll do it. Can I ask you questions?
Leave it to me. I'll teach you anything.
W-Well... I meant studying, okay?
Hey... Wait, Origami.
What is it?
That's my desk. And all my books are in there...

It's fine. Shido, you can use my desk and my
books.
Why...?
We'll make faster progress in various ways.
What do you mean?!

Whoa... She's already started concentrating...
So this is how an elite focuses...
...*Pant, pant*. Shido's... chair... desk...
HEY!

No problem. We're dating, Shido. So I can sit on
the chair where you'd normally sit, and imagine
things. It's natural.
Ngh... Well...

(There was a time I did kind of confess my love
for Origami. It was kind of training to be with
a Spirit...)

(But Origami had no idea about the training,
and accepted my confession... And for some
reason she agreed to it...)
(I guess we're currently a couple.)

(I wanted to clear up this mistake somehow,
but...)
Hey, Origami? You know... About us dating...

Shido, you've seen my underwear, sniffed my
gym clothes, and even had me stand in front
of everyone in a swimsuit and dog leash...

But don't worry. I'm taking all of that
inappropriate behavior as your way of
expressing your love for us as a couple.

Agh... Those were all accidents or
misunderstandings...! But I guess I can't
deny that they happened...

So Shido, don't hold back. You can bury your
face into my chair and breathe it in. In fact, I
would love if you did that.
I would never!
You won't?
I won't... All right, let's do homework.
Okay.

(We continued to talk together at school until
we finished our homework.)
